battleTraits.name: Under the Light of the Bad Moon
battleTraits.effect:
During the battle, an area of the battlefield will be the Bad Moon's location (see 'The Bad Moon's Orbit').  The Bad Moon's location will be either a quarter of the battlefield or the centre of the battlefield.

 While the Bad Moon's location is a quarter of the battlefield, all **GLOOMSPITE GITZ** units (friendly and enemy) wholly within that quarter are **under the light of the Bad Moon.**

 While the Bad Moon's location is the centre of the battlefield, all **GLOOMSPITE GiTZ** units (friendly and enemy) on the battlefield are **under the light of the Bad Moon.**

 While a friendly **GLOOMSPITE GITZ** unit is **under the light of the Bad Moon,** the appropriate effect below applies to it:

_**Frothing Zealots:**_ If the unit is a non-**SQUIG MOONCLAN** unit, add 3 to its control score.

_**Lunar Squigs:**_ If the unit is a **SQUIG** unit, you can re-roll the random characteristic roll for its Move characteristic.

_**Moonlit Hide:**_ If the unit is a **TROGGOTH** unit, add 1 to save rolls for it.

_**Spiderfang Venom:**_ If the unit is a **SPIDERFANG** unit, its combat attacks score critical hits on unmodified hit rolls of 5+.

battleTraits.name: The Bad Moon's Orbit

header.text: Once Per Battle Round (Army), Start of Battle Round

battleTraits.declare:
You must use this ability at the start of the battle round.

 If multiple players are commanding a Gloomspite Gitz army, then instead, at the start of the battle round, those players roll off and only the winner declares and uses this ability this battle round.
battleTraits.effect: If it is the first battle round, pick a quarter of the battlefield to be the Bad Moon's starting location. If it is the second or subsequent battle round, roll a dice. On a 1-3, the Bad Moon stays at its current location. On a 4+, the Bad Moon moves. The first time the Bad Moon moves, it moves to the centre of the battlefield. The second time it moves, it moves to the quarter diagonally opposite the quarter in which it started. The third time it moves, it moves off the battlefield and has no further effect on the battle.

abilities.name: Bouncing Fury
abilities.effect: Each time a friendly Squig unit charges, add 1 to the Attacks characteristic of its Fang-filled Gobs, Massive Fang-filled Gobs or Huge Fang- filled Gobs for the rest of the turn.

spells.name: Sneaky Distraction
spells.declare: Pick a friendly **GLOOMSPITE GITZ WIZARD** to cast this spell, then make a casting roll of 2D6.
spells.effect: Until the start of your next turn, subtract 1 from hit rolls for attacks made by enemy units while they are wholly within 12" of the caster.

abilities.name: Lurid Light
abilities.effect: Friendly Gloomspite Gitz units are under the light of the Bad Moon while they are wholly within 12" of this Manifestation.

abilities.name: Feedin' Time

header.text: Once Per Turn (Army), Your Hero Phase

abilities.declare: Pick a friendly Squig unit within this unit’s combat range to be the target.
abilities.effect:
Roll a dice. On a 2+, pick 1 of the following effects to apply for the rest of the turn:

Crimson Deffcap: Add 3" to the target’s Move characteristic.

Yellow Lurka: The target’s Fang-filled Gobs, Huge Fang-filled Gobs or Massive Fang-filled Gobs have Crit (Mortal).

abilities.name: A Prod in the Right Direction
abilities.effect: This unit can use the ‘Normal Move’ ability as if it were your movement phase.

abilities.name: Puffshroom Frenzy
abilities.effect: Add 1 to the Attacks characteristic of melee weapons used by other friendly Moonclan units while they are wholly within 12" of this unit. Subtract 1 from the Attacks characteristic of weapons used by enemy units while they are in combat with this unit.

abilities.name: Battle Damaged
abilities.effect: While this unit has 10 or more damage points, when it uses the 'Malfunctioning Leystone' ability, roll 1 dice instead of 3.

abilities.name: Greater Regeneration
abilities.effect: Heal (D6) this unit.

abilities.name: Malfunctioning Leystone
abilities.effect:
Roll 3 dice. You must pick 1 of those dice and apply the effect that corresponds to its value. Effects 2-6 persist until the start of your next turn.

1 - Glyph of Shyish: Inflict D3 mortal damage on this unit.

2 -  Glyph of Ghur: Add 1 to the Attacks characteristic of melee weapons used by friendly Troggoth units while they are wholly within 12" of this unit.

3 -  Glyph of Aqshy: Add 1 to the Rend characteristic of melee weapons used by friendly Troggoth units while they are wholly within 12" of this unit.

4 - Glyph of Hysh: This unit can use Unbind abilities as if it had Wizard (1).

5 - Glyph of Ulgu: Subtract 1 from hit rolls for shooting attacks that target friendly Troggoth units while they are wholly within 12" of this unit.

6 - Glyph of Chamon: This unit has Ward (5+).

abilities.name: Crushing Grip

header.text: Once Per Turn (Army), Any Combat Phase

abilities.declare: Pick an enemy unit within 1" of this unit to be the target.
abilities.effect: Roll a dice. If the roll equals or  exceeds the target’s Health characteristic, 1 model in the target unit is slain.

abilities.name: Blessings of the Cauldron
abilities.declare: Pick a friendly Gloomspite Gitz Wizard within 1" of this Manifestation to be the target.
abilities.effect: Add 1 to the target’s power level until the start of your next turn.

abilities.name: Goin' Somewhere?
abilities.effect: If a friendly Moonclan Infantry unit wholly within 12" of this unit uses the ‘Rally’ command, you can make 3 additional rally rolls of D6. However, friendly Moonclan Infantry units cannot use Retreat abilities while they are within 12" of this unit.

abilities.name: Gobbled Up
abilities.declare: Pick an enemy unit within 1" of this unit to be the target.
abilities.effect: Roll a dice. If the roll equals or exceeds the target’s Health characteristic, 1 model in the target unit is slain.

abilities.name: Hamstring

header.text: Once per Turn (Army), Your Shooting Phase

abilities.declare: If this unit’s Mean-eye is on the battlefield and not in combat, pick a visible enemy unit within 15" of this unit to be the target.
abilities.effect: Roll a dice. Add 1 to the roll if the target is damaged. On a 5+, inflict 1 mortal damage on the target.

abilities.name: Marking Your Territory
abilities.effect: Add 1 to the Rend characteristic of this unit’s Wolfgit Weapons while it contests an objective you control that is not contested by any other friendly units.

abilities.name: Can't Catch Us

header.text: Once Per Turn (Army), Enemy Movement Phase

abilities.effect: If this unit is not in combat, this unit can move D6". It cannot end that move in combat.

abilities.name: Netters
abilities.declare: Pick an enemy Infantry unit in combat with this unit to be the target.
abilities.effect: Roll a dice. On a 3+, subtract 1 from hit rolls for the target’s attacks for the rest of the turn.

abilities.name: Madcap Mushroom

header.text: Once Per Battle, Your Hero Phase

abilities.effect:
For the rest of the turn:

• Add 1 to this unit’s power level.
• If 2 or more dice in a casting roll for this unit have the same value, inflict D3 mortal damage on this unit after the Spell ability has been resolved.

abilities.name: Stuff 'Em In Me Bag

header.text: Once Per Turn (Army), Any Combat Phase

abilities.declare: Pick an enemy unit in combat with this unit to be the target.
abilities.effect: Roll a dice. If the roll is at least double the target’s Health characteristic, 1 model in the target unit is slain.

abilities.name: Timberrrrr!
abilities.effect: When this unit is destroyed, before removing it from play, the players must roll off. The winner picks a point on the battlefield within 3" of this unit. Inflict D3 mortal damage on each unit (friendly and enemy) within 3" of that point that has a lower Health characteristic than this unit.

abilities.name: Mollog's Mob
abilities.effect: This unit’s Bat Squig, Spiteshroom and Stalagsquig are tokens. After setting up this unit on the battlefield for the first time, place its tokens next to it.

abilities.name: Regeneration
abilities.effect: Heal (D3) this unit.

abilities.name: Unleash The Critters!
abilities.effect:
Pick 1 of the following effects:

Spore Cloud: Remove this unit’s Spiteshroom. For the rest of the turn, subtract 1 from hit rolls for attacks made by enemy units while they are in combat with this unit.

Bat Squig Attack!: Remove this unit’s Bat Squig. Pick an enemy unit in combat with this unit to be the target and roll a D3. On a 2+, inflict an amount of mortal damage on the target equal to the roll.

Rock-hard Skin: Remove this unit’s Stalagsquig. Ignore all modifiers to save rolls for this unit (positive and negative) for the rest of the turn.

abilities.name: Bitey Distractions
abilities.effect: This unit has Ward (5+) while any of its tokens are on the battlefield.

abilities.name: Deffcap Mushroom

header.text: Once Per Battle, Your Hero Phase

abilities.effect: Add 1 to this unit’s power level for the rest of the turn.

abilities.name: Wall Crawler
abilities.effect: This unit can pass across terrain features as if it had Fly.

abilities.name: Scuttle Away!

header.text: Once Per Turn (Army), End of Any Turn

abilities.declare: If this unit is in combat, pick this unit and up to 1 friendly Spider Riders unit that is in combat and wholly within 12" of this unit to be the targets.
abilities.effect: The targets can immediately use the ‘Retreat’ ability as if it were your movement phase without any mortal damage being inflicted on them.

abilities.name: The Looncourt's Quest
abilities.effect: Pick an objective or terrain feature within enemy territory to be the object of this unit’s quest.

abilities.name: Quest's End
abilities.declare: This unit can only use this ability if you control the object of this unit’s quest and this unit is contesting it.
abilities.effect: For the rest of the battle, this unit has Strike-first and Ward (4+).

abilities.name: Battle Damaged
abilities.effect: While this unit has 10 or more damage points, the Attacks characteristic of its Chitinous Legs is 6.

abilities.name: Catchweb Spidershrine
abilities.effect: Add 1 to casting rolls for friendly Spiderfang Wizards while they are wholly within 12" of this unit.

abilities.name: Wall Crawler
abilities.effect: This unit can pass across terrain features as if it had Fly.

abilities.name: Ensnaring Webbing

header.text: Once Per Turn (Army), Any Combat Phase

abilities.declare: Pick an enemy Infantry Hero within 1" of this unit to be the target.
abilities.effect: Roll a dice. On a 3+, the target has Strike-last for the rest of the turn.

abilities.name: Hidden Loons
abilities.declare: Pick this unit if it has not been deployed.
abilities.effect: Set up this unit in reserve hidden among the mobs. It has now been deployed.

abilities.name: Release the Fanatics!
abilities.declare: Pick this unit if it is hidden among the mobs. Then, pick a friendly Moonclan Shootas or Moonclan Stabbas unit that has 10 or more models to be the target.
abilities.effect: Set up this unit anywhere on the battlefield wholly within 6" of the target and more than 9" from all enemy units.

abilities.name: Whirling Death
abilities.effect: This unit has Strike-first.

profile.notes: This Hero can join an eligible regiment as a Moonclan Agitator.

abilities.name: Secret Tunnels
abilities.declare: Pick this unit if it has not been deployed.
abilities.effect: Set up this unit in reserve in a secret tunnel. It has now been deployed.

abilities.name: Neh Neh Na-Neh Neh! Can't Catch Me!

header.text: Once Per Turn (Army), Your Movement Phase

abilities.declare: Pick a visible friendly Monster or Beast unit to be the target.
abilities.effect:
For the rest of the turn, the target can use Charge abilities even if it used a Run ability in the same turn, but each time it uses a Move ability, it must end the move closer to this unit. 

In addition, for the rest of the turn, the first time the target ends a move within this unit’s combat range, inflict D6 mortal damage on this unit.

abilities.name: Emerge from the Depths
abilities.declare: Pick this unit if it is in a secret tunnel.
abilities.effect: Set up this unit anywhere on the battlefield more than 9" from all enemy units.

abilities.name: Boing! Smash!
abilities.declare: If this unit charged this phase,  pick an enemy unit within 1" of it to be the target.
abilities.effect: Roll a D3. On a 2+, inflict an amount of mortal damage on the target equal to the roll.

abilities.name: Regeneration
abilities.effect: Heal (D3) this unit.

abilities.name: Noxious Vomit
abilities.effect:
If any damage points are allocated to an enemy unit by attacks made with this unit’s Noxious Vomit, that unit is drenched in vomit until the start of your next turn.

While a unit is drenched in vomit:
• Subtract 1 from save rolls for that unit.
• Ignore positive modifiers to save rolls for that unit.

abilities.name: Regeneration
abilities.effect: Heal (D3) this unit.

abilities.name: Battle Damaged
abilities.effect: While this unit has 10 or more damage points, the Attacks characteristic of The Dread Mace is 4 and this unit has a Control characteristic of 10.

abilities.name: The Shield Inviolate

header.text: Reaction: Opponent declared a Spell ability

abilities.effect: If this unit was picked to be the target of that spell, roll a dice. On a 3+, ignore the effect of that spell on this unit. This unit can use this ability more than once per phase but only once per Spell ability.

abilities.name: Rampaging Destruction

header.text: Once Per Turn (Army), Any Charge Phase

abilities.effect:
If this unit charged this phase, pick 1 of the following effects:

• Roll a dice for each enemy unit within 1" of this unit. On a 2+, inflict an amount of mortal damage on that unit equal to the roll.
• Pick an enemy Monster in combat with this unit and roll 2D6. On a 7, this ability has no effect. Otherwise, inflict an amount of mortal damage on that unit equal to the results on the dice used for the 2D6 roll multiplied together. For example, a 2D6 roll of 2 and 6 would inflict 12 mortal damage (2 × 6).

abilities.name: The End of Empires
abilities.effect: Add 1 to the number of dice rolled when making charge rolls for friendly Destruction units while they are wholly within 12" of this unit, to a maximum of 3.

abilities.name: Avatar of Destruction
abilities.effect: If this unit would be automatically destroyed, it is not automatically destroyed. Instead, allocate 6 damage points to it (ward rolls cannot be made for those damage points).

abilities.name: Herding Squigs
abilities.effect: Roll a dice for each Squig Herder in this unit. For each 2+, you can return D3 slain Cave Squigs to this unit. For each 1, 1 Squig Herder in this unit is slain.

abilities.name: Squigs Gone Wild
abilities.effect: Each time a model in this unit is slain by a combat attack and that model was in combat with the attacking unit, roll a dice. On a 5+, inflict 1 mortal damage on the attacking unit after the Fight ability has been resolved.

abilities.name: Beast
abilities.effect: This unit has a maximum control score of 1.

abilities.name: Let's Get Bouncin'!

header.text: Reaction: You declared a Fight ability for this unit

abilities.effect: Pick a friendly non-Hero Squig Cavalry unit that has not used a Fight ability this turn and is within this unit’s combat range to be the target. The target can be picked to use a Fight ability immediately after the Fight ability used by this unit has been resolved. If it is picked to do so, add 1 to hit rolls for the target’s attacks for the rest of the turn.

abilities.name: Wall Crawler
abilities.effect: This unit can pass across terrain features as if it had Fly.

abilities.name: Netters
abilities.declare: Pick an enemy Infantry unit in combat with this unit to be the target.
abilities.effect: Roll a dice. On a 3+, subtract 1 from hit rolls for the target’s attacks for the rest of the turn.

abilities.name: Boing! Boing! Boing!
abilities.declare: Pick an enemy unit that this unit passed across this phase to be the target.
abilities.effect: Roll a dice for each model in this unit that passed across the target. For each 4+, inflict 1 mortal damage on the target.

abilities.name: The Loonking's Entreaty

header.text: Once Per Battle, Reaction: You declared the ‘The Bad Moon’s Orbit’ ability

abilities.effect: You can choose whether the Bad Moon moves to the next location or stays in its current location instead of rolling the dice.

abilities.name: Fangz of Da Bad Moon
abilities.declare: Pick a visible enemy unit within 18" of this unit to be the target, then make a casting roll of 2D6.
abilities.effect: Roll a number of dice equal to the unmodified casting roll. For each 3+, inflict 1 mortal damage on the target.

abilities.name: Babbling Wand

header.text: Reaction: You declared the ‘Redeploy’ command for a friendly Moonclan unit wholly within 12" of this unit

abilities.effect: If you roll a 1-3 when determining the distance that unit can move, you can use a value of 4 instead.

abilities.name: Battle Damaged
abilities.effect: While this unit has 10 or more damage points, the Attacks characteristic of its Chitinous Legs is 6.

abilities.name: Wall Crawler
abilities.effect: This unit can pass across terrain features as if it had Fly.

abilities.name: Voracious Predator

header.text: Once Per Turn (Army), Any Charge Phase

abilities.declare: Pick up to 3 enemy units within 1" of this unit to be the targets.
abilities.effect: Roll a D3 for each target. On a 2+, inflict an amount of mortal damage equal to the roll on that target.

abilities.name: Effigy of Da Bad Moon
abilities.effect: Friendly Gloomspite Gitz units are under the light of the Bad Moon while they are wholly within 12" of this terrain feature.

abilities.name: Moonclan Lairs

header.text: Once Per Turn (Army), End of Your Turn

abilities.declare: Pick a friendly non-Hero non-Monster non‑War Machine Gloomspite Gitz unit that has been destroyed to be the target.
abilities.effect: Set up a replacement unit with half the number of models from the target unit (rounding up) wholly within 12" of this terrain feature and more than 3" from all enemy units.

profile.notes: This Hero can join an eligible regiment as a Moonclan Agitator.

abilities.name: I'm Da Boss
abilities.declare: Pick a visible friendly Moonclan Stabbas unit wholly within 12" of this unit to be the target.
abilities.effect:
Roll a dice. On a 2+, pick one of the following effects:

Get Back ’Ere!: If the target is not in combat, you can return D6 slain models to it.

Stab ’Em Good!: Add 1 to wound rolls for the target’s attacks until the start of your next turn.

abilities.name: Let's get Stabbin'!

header.text: Reaction: You declared a Fight ability or this unit

abilities.effect: Pick a friendly non-Hero Moonclan Infantry unit that has not used a Fight ability this turn and is within this unit’s combat range to be the target. The target can be picked to use a Fight ability immediately after the Fight ability used by this unit has been resolved.

abilities.name: Gobbapalooza Know-Wotz
abilities.effect:
Roll a dice. On a 3+, pick 1 of the following effects:

Glareface Dance: Pick a friendly Gloomspite Gitz unit within this unit’s combat range. Add 1 to run rolls and charge rolls for that unit until the start of your next turn.

Nasty Poisons: Pick a friendly Gloomspite Gitz unit within this unit’s combat range. Add 1 to the Rend characteristic of that unit’s weapons until the start of your next turn.

Mesmerise: Pick a visible enemy unit within 12" of this unit. Until the start of your next turn, that unit cannot use commands.

abilities.name: Hallucinogenic Fungus Brews
abilities.effect: In the first battle round, this unit has Ward (4+). In the second battle round, this unit has Ward (5+). In the third and subsequent battle rounds, this unit has Ward (6+).

abilities.name: Battle Damaged
abilities.effect: While this unit has 10 or more damage points, the Attacks characteristic of its Chitinous Legs is 6.

abilities.name: Wall Crawler
abilities.effect: This unit can pass across terrain features as if it had Fly.

abilities.name: Flinger
abilities.effect: If any attacks made with this unit’s Flinger score a hit, after the Shoot ability has been resolved, roll a dice. On a 2+, the target unit is entangled until the start of your next turn. Halve the Move characteristic of a unit while it is entangled.

abilities.name: Beast-binding Webbing

header.text: Once Per Turn (Army), Any Combat Phase

abilities.declare: Pick an enemy unit that charged this turn and is in combat with this unit to be the target.
abilities.effect: Roll a dice. On a 3+, subtract 1 from the Attacks characteristic of the target’s Companion weapons for the rest of the turn.

abilities.name: Looncap Mushrooms

header.text: Once Per Turn (Army), Your Hero Phase

abilities.declare: If this unit is not in combat, pick a visible friendly Moonclan unit wholly within 12" of it to be the target.
abilities.effect: Roll a dice. Add 1 to the roll if this unit is under the light of the Bad Moon. On a 3+, the target has Ward (5+) until the start of your next turn. On a 6+, also add 1 to the Attacks characteristic of the target’s melee weapons until the start of your next turn.

abilities.name: Regeneration
abilities.effect: Heal (D3) this unit.

abilities.name: Magical Resistance

header.text: Reaction: Opponent declared a Spell ability

abilities.effect: If this unit was picked to be the target of that spell, roll a dice. On a 4+, ignore the effect of that spell on this unit.

abilities.name: Wade and Smash

header.text: Once Per Turn (Army), Any Combat Phase

abilities.effect: If this unit is in combat, it can move 6" but must end that move in combat. Then, roll a D3 for each enemy unit within 1" of this unit. On a 2+, inflict an amount of mortal damage on that unit equal to the roll.

abilities.name: Realmweb Lurker
abilities.declare: Pick this unit if it has not been deployed.
abilities.effect: Set up this unit in reserve skittering through tunnels in reality. It has now been deployed.

abilities.name: Battle Damaged
abilities.effect: While this unit has 10 or more damage points, the Attacks characteristic of its Chitinous Legs is 6.

abilities.name: Ambush from Beyond
abilities.declare: Pick this unit if it is skittering through tunnels in reality.
abilities.effect: Set up this unit anywhere on the battlefield more than 9" from all enemy units.

abilities.name: Wall Crawler
abilities.effect: This unit can pass across terrain features as if it had Fly.

abilities.name: Scuttling Terror

header.text: Once Per Turn (Army), Any Combat Phase

abilities.effect:
If this unit charged this turn, roll a dice. On a 3+, this unit can move 2D6". It can pass through the combat ranges of enemy units and can pass through models in enemy Infantry units, but it must end that move in combat.

Then, pick an enemy Infantry unit that this unit passed across during that move. Inflict D3 mortal damage on that enemy unit.

abilities.name: Squig Rage
abilities.effect: While this unit has 10 or more damage points, the Attacks characteristic of its Huge Fang-filled Gobs is 6.

abilities.name: Ker-Splat!

header.text: Once Per Turn (Army), Any Charge Phase

abilities.declare: If this unit charged this phase, pick an enemy unit within 1" of it to be the target.
abilities.effect: Roll a dice for each model in the target unit, to a maximum of 10. For each 4+, inflict 1 mortal damage on the target.

abilities.name: Bite Da Moon!

header.text: Once Per Battle (Army), Any Combat Phase

abilities.declare: Pick this unit and all friendly Squig units wholly within 12" of this unit to be the targets.
abilities.effect: Add 1 to wound rolls for the targets’ Fang-filled Gobs, Massive Fangfilled Gobs and Huge Fang-filled Gobs for the rest of the turn.

abilities.name: Watch Out!
abilities.effect: If this unit is destroyed, before removing it from play, roll a dice for each enemy unit within this unit’s combat range. On a 4+, inflict D3 mortal damage on that unit.

abilities.name: Mutating Spores
abilities.declare: Pick up to 3 enemy units within 6" of this Manifestation to be the targets.
abilities.effect: For each target, roll a number of dice equal to the number of models in that unit that are within 6" of this Manifestation. For each 5+, inflict 1 mortal damage on the target.

abilities.name: Wall Crawler
abilities.effect: This Manifestation can pass across terrain features as if it had Fly.

abilities.name: Endless Terrors
abilities.effect: This unit has Ward (4+) while it is wholly within 12" of any friendly Arachnarok units.

abilities.name: Squig Rage
abilities.effect: While this unit has 10 or more damage points, the Attacks characteristic of its Huge Fang-filled Gobs is 6.

abilities.name: Giant Boing!

header.text: Once Per Turn (Army), Any Charge Phase

abilities.effect: If this unit charged this turn, roll a dice. On a 3+, this unit can move 3D6" but must end that move in combat.

abilities.name: Watch Out!
abilities.effect: If this unit is destroyed, before removing it from play, roll a dice for each enemy unit within this unit’s combat range. On a 4+, inflict D3 mortal damage on that unit.

profile.notes: This Hero can join Trugg’s regiment.

abilities.name: Greater Regeneration
abilities.effect: Heal (D6) this unit.

abilities.name: Magical Resistance

header.text: Reaction: Opponent declared a Spell ability

abilities.effect: If this unit was picked to be the target of that spell, roll a dice. On a 4+, ignore the effect of that spell on this unit.

abilities.name: Shepherd of Destruction

header.text: Once Per Turn (Army), Any Combat Phase

abilities.effect: If this unit is in combat, roll a dice. On a 3+, for the rest of the turn, add 1 to the Attacks characteristic of melee weapons used by friendly Troggoth units while they are within this unit’s combat range.

abilities.name: Speed of the Spider God
abilities.declare: Pick a visible friendly Spiderfang unit wholly within 12" of this unit to be the target, then make a casting roll of 2D6.
abilities.effect: The target can use a Run ability this turn and still use Shoot and/or Charge abilities later in the turn.

abilities.name: Web Slingshot
abilities.declare: Pick a friendly Spiderfang unit or terrain feature within 18" of this unit to be the target.
abilities.effect: Roll a dice. On a 2+, remove this unit from the battlefield and set it up again wholly within 3" of the target and more than 9" from all enemy units.

abilities.name: Zarbag
abilities.effect: While this unit’s Zarbag is on the battlefield, it has Wizard (1).

abilities.name: Sniffer Spite
abilities.effect: If this unit’s Zarbag is on the battlefield and within 3" of a terrain feature, roll a dice. On a 4+, add 1 to this unit’s power level for the rest of the turn.
